questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a wireframe in web development?
choices: To showcase the final design of a website
To outline the basic structure and layout of each page
To optimize the website for search engines
questions.answer: To outline the basic structure and layout of each page

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a key component of a project plan?
What is Git primarily used for in web development?
What does the Git command 'git add' do?
choices: Pushes changes to a remote repository

questions.question: What is a repository in Git?
choices: A backup of your project files
A storage location for a project that contains all of its files and each file's revision history
A type of web hosting service
questions.answer: A storage location for a project that contains all of its files and each file's revision history

questions.question: What is the purpose of a domain name?
choices: To serve as the address where internet users can access a website
questions.answer: To serve as the address where internet users can access a website

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a type of web hosting?
What does DNS stand for in the context of web hosting?
What is the main advantage of using GitHub Pages for hosting?
choices: It's free and automatically integrated with Git repositories
questions.answer: It's free and automatically integrated with Git repositories

questions.question: What is a commit in Git?
choices: A saved snapshot of changes in the repository
questions.answer: A saved snapshot of changes in the repository

questions.question: Which Git command is used to download changes from a remote repository?
What is the purpose of a CNAME file in GitHub Pages?
What does SEO stand for?
Which of the following is NOT a best practice for commit messages in Git?
choices: Separate subject from body with a blank line

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of responsive design in web development?
choices: To ensure the website looks good on all device sizes
questions.answer: To ensure the website looks good on all device sizes

questions.question: What does WCAG stand for in web development?
Which of the following is NOT a type of wireframe?
What is the purpose of the 'git init' command?
choices: To initialize a new Git repository
To install Git on your computer
To push changes to a remote repository
questions.answer: To initialize a new Git repository

questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of using version control in web development?
choices: It automatically fixes bugs in your code
It eliminates the need for backups
It allows you to track changes and revert to previous versions
It speeds up website loading times
questions.answer: It allows you to track changes and revert to previous versions

questions.question: What is a branch in Git?
choices: A copy of the entire repository

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a consideration when choosing a web hosting provider?
What is the purpose of an A Record in DNS?
choices: To specify the mail server for a domain
To map a domain name to an IP address
To create an alias for another domain name
To define the start of authority for a DNS zone
questions.answer: To map a domain name to an IP address

questions.question: What does CI/CD stand for in the context of web development?
Which of the following is NOT a benefit of using GitHub Pages?
What is the purpose of the 'git clone' command?
choices: To create a copy of an existing repository
questions.answer: To create a copy of an existing repository

questions.question: Which of the following is a best practice for web accessibility?
choices: Using color as the only means of conveying information
Providing text alternatives for non-text content
questions.answer: Providing text alternatives for non-text content

questions.question: What is the purpose of a .gitignore file?
choices: To list files that should be committed to the repository
To specify files that Git should ignore
questions.answer: To specify files that Git should ignore

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common wireframing tool?
What is the primary purpose of using HTTPS for a website?
choices: To secure data transmission between the server and client
questions.answer: To secure data transmission between the server and client

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical milestone in a web development project timeline?
